personal.name: Prathvik Sankaliya
personal.title: Mobile Software Engineer
personal.tagline: Building secure, offline-first, and scalable mobile applications with Flutter and modern architectures.

about.description: I am a passionate Mobile Software Engineer with 2+ years of industry experience, specializing in Flutter and cross-platform mobile development for iOS and Android. My expertise lies in architecting offline-first, server-driven UI applications, implementing secure authentication, and building scalable apps with robust data synchronization strategies. With 6+ apps published on Google Play Store and 3+ apps on the App Store, I have a proven track record of delivering production-ready, high-performance mobile solutions that meet business and user needs.
highlights: Specialized in Flutter and cross-platform mobile app development
Architected offline-first and server-driven UI applications
Strong focus on security (biometric auth, AES-256 encryption, credential storage)
Published 6+ apps on Google Play Store and 3+ apps on App Store/TestFlight
